titleStmt.title: A sermon preached at Fulham, on Sunday, Oct. 13, 1689 at the consecration of the Right Reverend Fathers in God, Edward Lord Bishop of Worcester, Simon Lord Bishop of Chichester, & Gilbert Lord Bishop of Bristol / by John Scott.
titleStmt.author: Scott, John, 1639-1695.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Walter Kettilby and Thomas Horne,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
